nodes.text: A skirmish occurred in 3 ABY when Logray, the shaman of the Ewoks of Bright Tree Village, and his assistant Paploo met the Dathomiri witch named Charal in her lair. While the two Ewoks had only come to speak out their concerns about the recents events that plagued Endor, the conversation turned sour when Charal tried to seize the Sunstar, a powerful artifact wielded by Logray.
